reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Series of events Imaguru Women in Technology Will Program

description.narrative: The objective of the project is to encourage girls and young women to choose business and technology careers; to provide women with a platform of connections resources and opportunities and link it to Finnish platforms and initiatives to transform IT corp orate business and media perceptions of women; to create a pipeline of women to fill leadership positions or start up their own business in Belarus and globally to demonstrate that advancing women directly contribute to the prosperity of all and to influen ce top leaders in the Belarusian government academia and industry to recognize the purchasing power of women following Finnish experience and example.The target group of the project are young female and male entrepreneurs startup founders students with inn ovative and global products ideas and the plans to develop their career in technology and entrepreneurship. The project aims to develop a series of events to empower connect and support the next generation of women leaders in entrepreneurship and technolog y. Another approach is to enhance and strengthen female initiative through development of mentoring program. Female professionals mentors from Finland and Belarus will be invited to advise and develop female teams and startups. That will foster networking within the female community and promote a good experience and example of mentoring and giving-back culture. Open Bootcamps for coding will facilitate knowledge in different technologies and build confident that men and women are equal for technology world . Interviews and a wide promotion among mass media will show up cases examples and role models to strengthen the community influence and impact.
